mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t1.ID_ AS taskId, p.NAME_ AS subject, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t1.FORM_KEY_ AS formKey, p.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, p.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processId, DATE_FORMAT( t1.CREATE_TIME_, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS startTime FROM act_ru_task t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_identitylink t3 ON t3.TASK_ID_ = t1.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst p ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = p.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ = #{username} OR ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IN ( SELECT G.group_id_ FROM act_id_membership G WHERE G.user_id_ = #{username} ) ) OR ( ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL OR t1.ASSIGNEE_ = '' ) AND ( t3.USER_ID_ = #{username} OR t3.GROUP_ID_ IN ( SELECT g.group_id_ FROM act_id_membership g WHERE g.user_id_ = #{username} ) ) ) ) order by t1.CREATE_TIME_ desc

SELECT DISTINCT RES.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processId, p.name_ as subject, RES.NAME_ as name, RES.START_TIME_ as startTime, RES.END_TIME_ as endTime FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST RES LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst p ON RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = p.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE RES.ASSIGNEE_ = #{username} AND RES.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RES.ID_ desc

SELECT DISTINCT RES.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processId, RES.NAME_ AS subject, RES.START_TIME_ AS startTime, res.END_TIME_ AS endTime, DEF.KEY_ AS PROC_DEF_KEY_, DEF.NAME_ AS PROC_DEF_NAME_, DEF.VERSION_ AS PROC_DEF_VERSION_, DEF.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ AS DEPLOYMENT_ID_ FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST RES LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF DEF ON RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = DEF.ID_ WHERE RES.START_USER_ID_ = #{username} ORDER BY RES.ID_ desc

SELECT DISTINCT RES.ID_ AS taskId, p.NAME_ AS subject, RES.PROC_INST_ID_ as processId, RES.NAME_ name, RES.CREATE_TIME_ as createTime FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst p ON RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = p.PROC_INST_ID_ ORDER BY RES.ID_ desc

SELECT DISTINCT RES.NAME_ as name, p.NAME_ AS subject, RES.START_TIME_ AS startTime, RES.END_TIME_ AS endTime, RES.ID_ AS taskId, RES.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processId FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST RES LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst p ON RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = p.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE RES.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RES.ID_ desc
